title: John Day Fossil Beds National Monument: Sojourns
body: Sojourns                         Sojourns: Coyote Serenade Sojourns provides an opportunity for you to spend a moment with the natural landscapes and soundscapes of the fossil beds. This episode: A lone coyote sings near the trailhead for the Blue Basin.  Duration:1 minute, 15 seconds           Â                     Sojourns: Green Water Sojourns provides an opportunity to spend a moment with the natural landscapes and soundscapes of the fossil beds. This episode: Water tinted green by runoff from the claystone of the Blue Basin fills a periodic creek bed.  Duration:1 minute, 15 seconds
